title: Can I apply re evaluation for Madras university of distance education results now? Will they reduce my marks? - Quora

response.answer_text: Revaluation of answer scripts are possible only if one applies within the prescribed dates along with the required fees. Some universities adopt online procedures while some follows offline procedures. Normally marks will increase or there won’t be any changes. No marks would be reduced at a later stage once the marks (results) have been declared.
